means: 古吉拉特邦(印度西部的邦)
古吉拉特(地区)(印度西部，纳巴达河以北地区)[亦作 Gujerat]

sentence.Network_en: They also publish an excellent cookery book called "The Flavours Of Gujarat" (£2.95, plus £0.25 p & p).
sentence.Network_cn: 他们还出版了一本很好的食谱，名叫《古吉拉特美食》（2.95英镑，外加0.25英镑邮资及包装费）。

sentence.Network_en: You had said that this is not Gujarat and that this area is yours!
sentence.Network_cn: 你说这里不是古吉拉特而是你的地盘!

sentence.Network_en: International organizations have also rushed relief supplies and medical personnel to Gujarat.
sentence.Network_cn: 国际组织已将救援物资和医务人员火速运往古吉拉特邦.

means.word_mean: 1. a region of western India north of Bombay (bordering the Arabian Sea) where Gujarati is spoken
2. an industrialized state in western India that includes parts of Bombay
